div.div:
• Operation Name: What action was performed
• Timestamps: Start time, end time, duration
• Span Context: trace_id, span_id, parent_span_id
• Tags/Attributes: http.method, http.status, db.statement
• Events: Significant points in time during the span
• Status: OK, ERROR (with message)

switch.text: • Operation Name: What action was performed...

• Manual instrumentation (custom spans)
• Context propagation (W3C Trace Context)
